description: In Rwanda as from 04 May 2020, Individual sporting activities allowed, gyms to remain closed
type_text: Fitness enthusiasts will from Monday, May 4, have the liberty to carry out individual sporting activities in open spaces between  5 a.m., and 8 p.m. However, gyms and other recreation/sporting facilities will remain closed.

description: A team of Rwandan developers backed by investors from the UK and US have developed an electronic learning platform,Homeskul ,that seeks to connect teachers and students
type_text: Homeskul is an e-learning portal that connects experienced teachers to parents who are busy to homeschool their children.The platform was developed to respond to the learning needs of students and teachers who have been left with nowhere to go with schools now closed in Rwanda
